name: Avarus
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 42,  Avarus is a pattern match game about money and greed.  Tap coins to exchange them for a handful of its matches, drag a coin to its match to pull the next coin from the queue, and don't run out of space on the board!

Team: 

  • Stephen Young - Programming & Game Design
  • Justin Palmer - Game Design & Graphics 
  • Jonathan Marlin - Music
